# usesMetricSystem

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the locale uses the metric system.

## Declaration

```swift
var usesMetricSystem: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the same value returned by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale/object(forKey:)] method when passing the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale/Key/usesMetricSystem] key.
